name: A Snakes Way
description:
This is a short game I created after seeing Huang Yong Ping's 'Ressort.' At goma. If you wish to read up more on why I made the game I did in relation to Ressort please check out my blog on the subject. And you can look at my post-mortem here.

Controls:

W,A,S,D or arrow keys to fly around.

Credits:

Music:

"Lightless Dawn" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
